mapper.insert: insert into board values (seq_board_no.nextval, #{title}, #{content}, hit, sysdate, #{user_no})
mapper.select: select b.no, b.title, u.name, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date, 'YY/MM/DD HH:MI') reg_date, u.no user_no from board b, users u where b.uesr_no = u.no order by b.no desc
select b.no u.name, b.hit, to_char(b.reg_date,'yyyy-mm-dd') reg_date, b.title, b.content, u.no from board b, users u where b.user_no = u.no and b.no = #{no}
